name: part_007
file: tmp_【新曲あり！？】hololive IDOL PROJECTユニット初集合LIVE！ [FWXAnb08CPg]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_007.mov

scenes.description: Ayame, Fubuki, and Mio perform their unit song on a stage with a torii gate background.
Transition between performances as the stage lights change and the next unit prepares.
The unit NEGI☆U (Subaru, Aqua, Nene) performs their high-energy song 'PANIGHT'.
MC section where the members of NEGI☆U introduce themselves and talk about their performance.

subtitles.original: 恋した浮き雲へ と伝うように
subtitles.english: As if conveying it to the floating clouds I've loved

subtitles.original: 愛した浮き雲へと 届くように
subtitles.english: As if reaching the floating clouds I've cherished

subtitles.original: はじまー！はじまー！はじまー！

subtitles.english: To all the students nationwide who haven't finished their homework!

subtitles.english: Incredible, crazy, insane, not enough

subtitles.original: 板のバッター かたじけない (かたじけない)
subtitles.english: Sorry, butter on the board (my bad)

subtitles.original: スゴい ヤバい パない Sunday Night
subtitles.english: Incredible, crazy, insane, Sunday Night

subtitles.original: とにかくもう やるしかない (やるしかない)
subtitles.english: Anyway, there's no choice but to do it (do it)

subtitles.original: スゴい ヤバい パない 物足りない
subtitles.english: Incredible, crazy, insane, not enough

subtitles.original: 宿題やっぱり 終わらない (終わらない)
subtitles.english: The homework after all isn't finishing (isn't finishing)

subtitles.original: たった一度の青春は (わ～！？)
subtitles.english: This youth that only happens once (Wha~?!)

subtitles.original: 満開HAPPY PANIGHT (一緒にせーの！)
subtitles.english: Full bloom HAPPY PANIGHT (All together now!)

subtitles.original: ねね～、あてぃ～、終わんねーよこれ～
subtitles.english: Nene~, Ati~, I'm never gonna finish this~

subtitles.original: スバル先輩～～！この問題全然わかんないんですけどー！
subtitles.english: Subaru-senpai~! I don't get this problem at all!

subtitles.original: えーっ！何その鉛筆！めっちゃ可愛いじゃん、いいなー！
subtitles.english: Wha-! What's with that pencil! It's super cute, I'm jealous!

subtitles.original: でしょう～～ww キラキラ光るんですよ～ホホホ
subtitles.english: Right? lol It sparkles and shines! Hohoho

subtitles.original: え、へへ、みんな、元気だなあ...
subtitles.english: E-hehe, everyone's so energetic...

subtitles.original: よ、陽キャって、こんな時も、すごいなー...
subtitles.english: W-wow, extroverts are amazing even at times like this...
Hahahahaha... um... hahah...

subtitles.original: は、はーりー！w
subtitles.english: P-PANIGHT! lol

subtitles.original: ありがとうございましたー！
subtitles.english: Thank you very much!

subtitles.original: ということでー、ホロライブ2期生、大空スバル！そして！
subtitles.english: And so, hololive 2nd generation, Oozora Subaru! And!

subtitles.original: 皆様どうもこんあくあー！湊あくあでーす！そして！
subtitles.english: Hello everyone, Kon-Aqua! Minato Aqua here! And!

subtitles.original: こんねねー！桃鈴ねねねねねねです！よろしくにぇー！
subtitles.english: Kon-Nene! I'm Momosuzu Nenenenenene! Nice to meet ya!

subtitles.original: 私たち！せーの！NEGI☆Uでーす！
subtitles.english: We are! Ready, set! NEGI☆U!

subtitles.original: あー、ギリギリですねーw
subtitles.english: Ah, that was close! lol

subtitles.original: マジ、でもこの向き、こっちの方が、え？
subtitles.english: Seriously, but this way, it's better... eh?

subtitles.original: こう？こう？どっちかにして、どっちかにしてー
subtitles.english: Like this? Like this? Pick one, just pick one!

subtitles.original: いや無理だろこれ、なんで決めずにやったんだよこれ
subtitles.english: No, that's impossible. Why did we do this without deciding first?

subtitles.original: 今突然だったんだから、しょうがないじゃない
subtitles.english: It was so sudden just now, so we couldn't help it.

subtitles.original: まあでもね、ギリギリ決まっててということで
subtitles.english: Well anyway, since we barely managed it...

subtitles.original: さあ、1曲目はね、NEGI☆Uの新曲、PANIGHT披露させていただきました！
subtitles.english: Now, for our first song, we performed NEGI☆U's new song, PANIGHT!

subtitles.original: PANIGHT、みんなどうだったー？
subtitles.english: How did everyone like PANIGHT?

subtitles.original: まあでもみんなね、TikTokで多分ショートバージョン聞いてくれてると思うから
subtitles.english: Well, I think most people have heard the short version on TikTok.

subtitles.original: フルでね、MVもね、出てるしね
subtitles.english: The full version and the MV are out too.

subtitles.original: ねー、ねー、どうだった、どうだったー？
subtitles.english: Right? Right? How was it? How was it?

subtitles.original: やっぱ陽キャソングだよねー
subtitles.english: It's definitely an extrovert song!

subtitles.original: なんかさ、すごいキラキラしてなかった？
subtitles.english: Didn't it feel super sparkly?

subtitles.original: 結構圧強かったよねw
subtitles.english: The pressure was quite strong, wasn't it? lol
